lender.name: Clay
lender.loan_because: If given the opportunity and the access, I believe everyone has the potential for success. I also believe in loan programs as a way to help redistribute global capital.
lender.occupational_info: I am an actor in films and on television. Not a famous one, but usually the funny one who's only in the movie for a short time.

lender.name: Thomas
lender.loan_because: I've been blessed in my life and would like to help those less fortunate. They have the desire to succeed but need some help at times.
lender.occupational_info: I wholesale mutual funds to financial advisors

lender.name: Vira
lender.loan_because: this is what I wanted as a birthday gift from my daughters. I will enjoy seeing the progress and others will benefit from my gift.

lender.name: Jared & Gretchen
lender.loan_because: We all need a helping hand sometimes in our lives.

lender.name: Marc
lender.loan_because: I'm certainly not rich by any means, however what little extra cash I have is best used to help others realize their dreams.

lender.name: Greg
lender.loan_because: I like to help where I can.
lender.occupational_info: I develop methods for measuring nutrients in food.

lender.name: Zaid & Nicole
lender.loan_because: This system is the most efficient we have ever seen.

lender.name: Peter
lender.loan_because: it makes a difference.
lender.occupational_info: I work for World Vision, an international development organisation.

lender.name: J. Keith
lender.loan_because: "Be the change you seek."
lender.occupational_info: I try to make people laugh.

lender.name: elithea
lender.loan_because: i'm an artist, too, but i can teach to make ends meet. i can be a little help here for awhile. go, ablam!
lender.occupational_info: i am an artist, and i also teach art in elementary school,

lender.name: Beatrice O ' Hanlon
lender.loan_because: I want to help
lender.occupational_info: I work in an emergency room at a hospital

lender.name: Pamela
lender.loan_because: I can
lender.occupational_info: I work at a hospital laboratory. I use a microscope to diagnose diseases, especially cancer.

lender.name: Coryn
lender.occupation: Advertsing Sales & Comm & Res Real Estate

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: I want to help those who are trying to help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I work on computer software.

lender.name: Joy
lender.loan_because: small-scale, sustainable projects have great potential to change lives for the better.
lender.occupational_info: I take care of sick people in a clinic and hospital in a large city.

lender.name: Carling
lender.loan_because: A little can go a long way

lender.name: Tim and Kathie
lender.loan_because: We currently have a loan that got us started, so we wanted to do the same for someone else. :)
lender.occupational_info: We like helping others who may not have the means to get out of a difficult situation on their own.

lender.name: Anna
lender.loan_because: Before having children, my husband and I met many wonderful people traveling and these loans seem like a good way to help them better themselves. I am drawn in by the pictures and stories of the borrowers. I like building a diverse portfolio, but particularly look for loans in SE Asia and Pharmacy/Healthcare.
lender.occupational_info:
I help people with their medications. I am a mom to 2 children, a preschooler and a second grader.
My sister Janet introduced me to Kiva, she also keeps my map current! http://www.kiva.org/lender/janet5534

lender.name: Natasha
lender.loan_because: It feels good

lender.name: Janet
lender.loan_because: I enjoy giving hardworking people around the world a chance to make a better life for themselves.
lender.occupational_info:
I'm a retired software engineer. Currently I tutor high school students with their schoolwork and also help them prepare for their university entrance examinations. I enjoy quilting in my spare time. My focus is sponsoring fabric, sewing, tailoring and educational loans.
My younger sister is also a kiva lender: http://www.kiva.org/lender/anna9149

lender.name: Robin
lender.loan_because: To think such a small loan on my part can make so big a difference in somebody's life.

lender.name: Elizabeth
lender.loan_because: I have volunteered in Uganda, Rwanda, Kenya and the Democratic Republic of Congo. This is a family I met outside Goma, DRC. Once you have experienced their determination and strength, in the face of poverty and danger, you are forever changed, in the best of ways.
lender.occupational_info: Attorney and Entrepreneur. Trusts, wills, elder law, and tax exempt organizations.

lender.name: Ris
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference in the lives under-privilege women and children............
lender.occupational_info: Working towards sustainable economic progress. Professionally I am responsible for reducing the environmental impact of consumer electronics in our lives. Personally, I aspire towards inclusive progress - especially for people traditionally left behind.

lender.name: Jimmy & Christy
lender.loan_because: we believe that everyone should have an equal opportunity to support their families and/or realize their dreams. We are working toward those same goals here in the US, and have nothing but respect and admiration for Kiva members who are looking for not a hand-out, but a hand-up.
lender.occupational_info: Jimmy works as a retail store manager, and is a full time college student. Christy is a stay at home Mom who is on the path to opening her own photography studio.

lender.name: PeopleFud
lender.loan_because: There is no greater satisfaction for a person than to provide for themselves and the ones they love through thier own achievement and hard work.
lender.occupational_info: We create pet products to make the lives of pets better.

lender.name: Jamshed
lender.loan_because: I am lucky enough to be able to help others.
lender.occupational_info: I test cell phone networks.

lender.name: James
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: I can. Really because I think Kiva is the greatest idea anyone has come up with in a long time. The people I loan to seem to be really honorable and appreciative.

lender.name: Tané Tachyon
lender.loan_because: To help people all over the world improve their lives and their communities.

lender.name: Chuck
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Sanjay
lender.loan_because: I really think this will make a difference
lender.occupational_info: Insurance Broker

lender.name: Bernadette
lender.loan_because: It is the right thing to do to finally get a handle on poverty around the world.
lender.occupational_info: I work in Humanitarian services with the UN.

lender.name: hawbir
lender.loan_because: i like help another people
lender.occupational_info: is ok

lender.name: Carey
lender.loan_because: I want to help make a difference.
lender.occupational_info: Consulting on CSR and Social audit in Vietnam and Southeast Asia.

lender.name: Kai
lender.loan_because: I can see this really works and I want to help people who are not as fortunate as me, living in a wealthy country.

lender.name: Melanie
lender.loan_because: This is a fantastic opportunity to help someone become self -sufficient. It's great to hear their story and of their success. Nothing is more rewarding.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a German doctor in Kuwait for a clinic and a heatlhcare management company. We also bring visiting doctors to Kuwait form other countries, but mainly from Germany, to see and treat patients in Kuwait.

lender.name: Jeannette
lender.loan_because: To let people know there is still hope in this world! Thanks to KIVA! BRAVO!

lender.name: M.S
lender.loan_because: I can afford it.

lender.name: Lilian
lender.loan_because: we were lucky and we should share some of our luck.
lender.occupational_info: writing articles for a company

lender.name: mamdoh
lender.loan_because: i need to be better and make my poor family better
lender.occupational_info: it is internet cafe

lender.name: Dale
lender.loan_because: I have to do something against global poverty
lender.occupational_info: I teach in a Spanish university

lender.name: Kamel
lender.loan_because: It feels good
lender.occupational_info: Managing a company that develops IT solutions for hospitality industry

lender.name: Inge & Jeremy
lender.loan_because: I can. It's really that simple, just give what you can and make a difference!

lender.name: Azadeh
lender.loan_because: I don't have much money to spend for myself, but I really think that helping others get the income they really nead is more important then for me to get something extra that I don't really need. That's why I love to spend this money for others.
lender.occupational_info: I learn people how to solve there personel problems.

lender.name: Marwan
lender.loan_because: The right thing to do.

lender.name: Sunny
lender.loan_because: I can, and it helps!

lender.name: Pedro
lender.loan_because: I want to help.
lender.occupational_info: I work on Portuguese Phone Campany "PT"

lender.name: Fedelis Chek
lender.occupation: Structural Engineer Drafter and Cloth dealer

lender.name: Luciana
lender.loan_because: i feel that i can make a difference
lender.occupational_info: I manage an art center in one of the souqs in Qatar. We organize art exhibitions, workshops, lectures, concerts and fairs, where pan arab artists can show and sell their works, as well as have contact with the local community, exchanging ideas e spreading knowledge.

lender.name: marten
lender.loan_because: i have a good live en wish the same to others
lender.occupational_info: i write childrens books novels and lots of other books

lender.name: Dana
lender.loan_because: As a former Kiva fellow, I was inspired to not only make a career out of microfinance but keep it personal. I now work with a similar peer-to-peer lending model based in Chicago that works with donations to keep funding in-country for accelerated development.

lender.name: Caroline
lender.loan_because: It makes me happy and I like knowing that I can make a difference (even if it is in a very small way).

lender.name: Rick
lender.loan_because:
I have been fortunate in my life and wish to help others help make a better life for themselves.
I sincerely believe in what Sir Winston Churchill once said-> "We make a living by what we get, we make a life by what we give".
.
lender.occupational_info: I am a volunteer at a health services clinic, Magnet, located in the Castro area of San Francisco.

lender.name: Hans
lender.loan_because: It gives me a good feeling to support people who needed it and I think that this is a verry effective way. Tell me, who in our western world can't spent 25 dollars every month?

lender.name: ewaPewa
lender.loan_because: I hope that my help can bring smiles, happiness and success.

lender.name: Abdullah
lender.occupational_info: I'm a Computer Technician in Kuwait International Airport.

lender.name: Kasia & Takashi
lender.loan_because: We think that everybody has a right to have a chance. We wish everybody to be able to catch their dreams - and seek for a new ones. :-) Good luck!
lender.occupational_info: Kasia: I'm Polish, living in Japan. For work I make websites, like this (Kiva) one. I take photos of nature and animals too. Takashi: I'm Japanese, I work as a network setting manager.

lender.name: Beth
lender.loan_because: I want to help other women succeed in their lives, which will affect the lives of their family and friends. Pay it forward

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: gut feeling that it is a good thing to do

lender.name: Yonny
lender.loan_because: Mi necesidad primordialmente es la adquisicion de un computador portatil marca ("ipod"o "hp") de 2 gigas y de 160 de disco duro, pantalla de 13 pulgadas de aproximadamente US 1500 americanos para poder llevar mis registros contables y de ventas más en orden, como a la vez estar en continuo contacto con mis clientes y proveedores, ya que me generan la manera de sostenerme, y a la vez tener una conexion con el mundo exterior. es una actividad que he consolidado atraves de los años y actualmente me da un nivel de sostenimiento, por ello es de grande necesidad la adquisicion de esta maquina por ello doy muchas gracias a la persona que me pueda dar la mano o apoyar para adquirirlo ya que no tengo capacidad de comprarlo por mis propios medios,,muchas gracias...
lender.occupational_info: Mi actividad comercial actual, radica en la comercializacion al por menor de todo tipo de mercancia, en especial perfumeria francesa y americana, visitando en la localidad en la cual vivo,"Bucaramanga" clientes en oficinas, empresas, negocios, que adquieren mis productos de una manera personalizada, este tipo de actividad, la he realizado en los ultimos 7 años la cual me genera un rublo para sostenimiento personal y familiar ya que vivo, con mis padres

lender.name: moncef
lender.loan_because: i need help for living

lender.name: Geraldine
lender.loan_because: We are all responsible for each other and this is a great way for me to help others.
lender.occupational_info: All of the waste that goes into the local sewers flows to the plant where I work. I help to ensure the the waste is removed and the water is clean before it goes to the creek.

lender.name: Mary
lender.loan_because: I want to have my future business for my little girl when she grows up and be proud of me. I want to help my daddy and my mommy because whent they get old and nobody takes care of them while they are here and lastly I want to help people around me who needs my help at the same time with the helping hand of KIVA ORG. These my that I really want to full fill in my life before GOD will take me.

lender.name: Elizabeth
lender.occupational_info: im a very hard working

lender.name: Ray & Susie
lender.loan_because: We have a desire to help people as we are fortunate to be in a position to do so.
lender.occupational_info: Peace keeper

lender.name: Bianca&Vincent
lender.loan_because: We think it's important to do something for people in need when you're able to do so.
lender.occupational_info: We work at a finance department.

lender.name: Gertrud
lender.loan_because: I am convinced it's a good way to encourage people.

lender.name: Thomas
lender.loan_because: To help someone set up a business
lender.occupational_info: We are a class of students specialised in banking.

lender.name: Dayna
lender.loan_because: I like the idea of helping people help themselves.

lender.name: Katie
lender.loan_because: I'm a student, and therefore I don't have a lot of money. However, I can be a part of a support system for another human being who just wants the same opportunities that I have to be independently successful.
lender.occupational_info: I help business owners by giving them the chance to gain financial autonomy and self-determination.

lender.name: Debra
lender.loan_because: I grew up poor by US standards but I have visited other countries and realize that I had much by world standards. Dignity and respect are more important than charity.
lender.occupational_info: Office work

lender.name: Udo
lender.loan_because: I like this idea and the small projects that help people so much.

lender.name: Patricia
lender.loan_because: I want to be more connected with people around the world and help others achieve their goals in life, as I've tried to do through teaching.
lender.occupational_info: I teach History and Sociology to college students of all ages and backgrounds.

lender.name: Ruth
lender.loan_because: Me and my mum want to make a difference in the world, even just a little bit.
lender.occupational_info: I sit at my computer and hope for inspiration -when that doesn't work I write as much as I can and then edit all the worst bits out!

lender.name: Laura
lender.loan_because:
I lend because I can.
" Do not wait for leaders; do it alone, person to person"
Mother Theresa
lender.occupational_info: I help people buy homes by working with a bank to lend them money.

lender.name: Pat and Jim
lender.loan_because: It makes us feel great to help someone far away. To be able to insure their children's future. To be able to educate them and improve their lives. Our own children do not need much financial help anymore. It feels good to offer someone a better future.
lender.occupational_info: we don't work at a job anymore. I used to be a supervisor at a printing facility within General Motors and my husband used to do computer work. Now we play with our grand children and try to have fun in our lives.

lender.name: Jim
lender.loan_because: I think not all aid to the poor needs to come thru mega-charities or governmental agencies. There are other niches of need and Kiva has addressed one in an innovative way. I like that I can connect to an individual - know their name, their face and a little about their life.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a graphic designer. I design everything from book covers to billboards.

lender.name: Magdalena
lender.loan_because: Everyone needs a chance

lender.name: Nils Lipecki
lender.loan_because: Because I belive that grassroot development is preferable to charity.

lender.name: Donna
lender.loan_because: I am a entrepreneur and I know how hard it is to get people to help me. When I saw what you all have done I thought I could give atless $25 to help.
lender.occupational_info: I photograph family portraits,children,weddings,entertainer,tv,magazines,sports,movies,working on a couple of books

lender.name: Sheila
lender.loan_because: I want to help.
lender.occupational_info: I am a potter. I like to work with my hands and make things.

lender.name: N, J, and family
lender.loan_because: Our family wants to help.
lender.occupational_info: computer software/hardware, urban planner, our children are college and high school students.

lender.name: Cavalier FBLA
lender.loan_because: It is important to offer others equal opportunities if you are in a position to do so.
lender.occupational_info: We strive to improve ourselves through learning about the world around us and helping where we can.

lender.name: Darren
lender.loan_because: I care.

lender.name: Kari
lender.loan_because: I have been very fortunate in life and feel that I should give back to the world in some way.
lender.occupational_info: I work in hotels.

lender.name: Guneet
lender.loan_because: I love the idea of helping others, even if its one individual at a time.

lender.name: Sanya
lender.occupation: believer in the goodness of humanity

lender.name: WUSC Humber
lender.loan_because: Our mission is to foster human development and global understanding through education and training.
lender.occupational_info: We are a student organization called World University Service of Canada (wusc). Our local branch is in Humber College, Toronto.

lender.name: Piotr
lender.loan_because: it is a pleasure

lender.name: Derwin
lender.loan_because: I want to provide the opportunity to others to improve their lives.
lender.occupational_info: I teach Information & Communication Technology.

lender.name: Polly
lender.loan_because: It's a way to change the paradigm. For the better.

lender.name: Irene
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference where ever I can.

lender.name: Simona&Gerard
lender.loan_because: It is a great way to help great people !

lender.name: Congregational Church
lender.loan_because: Our Christian faith compels us to love and care for others and to share the blessings we are given by God.
lender.occupational_info: Christian Church in Waterville, Maine, USA

lender.name: Neil
lender.loan_because: I want everyone to have the chance at a better life. This is my way of giving someone else that chance..

lender.name: Violeta
lender.loan_because: Clothing sales
lender.occupational_info: I show the clothes to my customers in their houses or sometime in my house

lender.name: Markus Amanto
lender.loan_because: I believe work is love in action. I believe sites like Kiva empower people. When we spread more love and empowerment the world becomes a better place for our children.
lender.occupational_info: I help people develop their potential in life, business and relationships.

lender.name: Meredith
lender.loan_because: Even though I'm barely getting by myself, I can spare $50/yr to make a difference in this world.
lender.occupational_info: I tell stories through plays, music and live performance.

lender.name: Ingrid
lender.loan_because: I work full-time and also attend school at nights to get my MBA. I've been trying for a very long time to figure out a way to help others without the time commitment that ... - in all sincerity - I do not have at the moment. Because I am originally from Costa Rica I understand the difficulties some of these individuals go through in their own countries to get above poverty levels. I'm so glad I heard about Kiva! Thanks to all of you who have supported this program and thanks to the individuals who spearheaded Kiva... Hopefully I'll be able to see sponsors from Costa Rica very soon…
lender.occupational_info: I work with the Finance and Information Systems department in my company to help bring about technology-based solutions to the business issues the company faces every day.

lender.name: Scott
lender.loan_because: Everyone should.

lender.name: Kathleen
lender.loan_because: I spent my career working for US AID, and learned how important microcredit loans can be. Besides that, it makes me feel good.
lender.occupational_info: I spned a lot of time volunteering my services. My favorite acitivies are giving tours of historical sites and museums.

lender.name: Terence
lender.loan_because: "The best time to plant a tree was 20 years ago. The next best time is now." ~Chinese Proverb

lender.name: Travis and Elaine
lender.loan_because: We never go to bed with the worry of putting food on the table, or a roof over our heads, but we remember what it feels like.
lender.occupational_info: We write stories for the movies, we take pictures and we develop content for the internet,

lender.name: Deb
lender.loan_because: it's a great way to help change people's lives a little at a time.
lender.occupational_info: As the writer of "Wordplay", the official blog of The New York Times crossword puzzle, I am the online voice of of puzzle solvers around the world. I also construct crosswords for The Onion and BUST Magazine, and am a humor writer whose book "It's Not PMS, It's You" (Sterling) is available where all fine literature is sold.

lender.name: Cheryl Sultan
lender.loan_because: My wish is for a world filled with love, peace and prosperity. My passion is helping women in Nicaragua, as this is part of my heritage and I have seen first hand the poverty that exists in this country. No child should die of starvation, ever.

lender.name: Philippe
lender.loan_because: I'm convinced of the need and of the solution
lender.occupational_info: I'm working on imaging solution for mobile phone.

lender.name: Bhanu Mullapudi
lender.loan_because: Its not a give away, its lending. The people who receive money have responsibility to payback, which I think makes them powerful and gives a lasting support, unlike one-time charity benefit.
lender.occupational_info: I design software for computers. I enable innovation at work.

lender.name: Vikki
lender.loan_because: Everyone needs a little help sometime in their lives. And to be able to repay that help by helping others, is what it's all about.

lender.name: Students at OU
lender.occupational_info: We are a marketing class at Oakland University, MI.

lender.name: Kendra
lender.loan_because: I know that I'm fortunate to live where I do and to have the resources that I have. I want to help other women to succeed as well.

lender.name: Alesia
lender.loan_because: It's a Beautiful thing to give!

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: my mom says its a good thing to do. I can help people who don't have much money in other parts of the world.

lender.name: Jeremy
lender.loan_because: a North American dollar goes farther in a developing nation.

lender.name: Maxshi
lender.loan_because: Even a small amount can change a life.

lender.name: LUIS EDUARDO
lender.occupational_info: en la actividad agricola y pecuaria ya que poseo una finca pequeña y desearia invertir en la compra de ganado al destete en un plazo de 365 dias

lender.name: Danny
lender.loan_because: We are family.
lender.occupational_info: I am a student in college who is studying to be a pastor for teenagers.

lender.name: Catherine
lender.loan_because: I have so much: they have so little
lender.occupational_info: I help dying people to live until they die

lender.name: Jeannine & John
lender.loan_because: we can.
lender.occupational_info: I am a Software Engineer, and John is s social work who supports homeless people in Denver.

lender.name: Ann & Dana
lender.loan_because: Helping to pass it along!
lender.occupational_info: We paint houses, inside and out. We also invest in real estate on a small scale with rental houses and flipping houses.

lender.name: Connie
lender.loan_because: I could not pass up the opportunity to personally help someone become self-sufficient. What an incredible chance to support women around the world to be successful in business. Thank you Kiva!
lender.occupational_info: As a Financial Advisor / Trust Officer, I manage investment accounts in varying degrees. It can be as simple as administering funds wherever directed, or as a Trustee, I may be responsible for paying bills and determining how much money a beneficiary will receive. It is a rewarding occupation with the opportunity to meet and work with a variety of people.

lender.name: Keith & Kay
lender.loan_because: We've been very fortunate to get to follow our hearts. We want to help others do the same.
lender.occupational_info: Keith: musician, retired Music Professor Kay: Pilates instructor, Adjunct Professor at Belmont University

lender.name: Glenn
lender.loan_because: Feels good to help people move themselves forward on their terms.

lender.name: Judith
lender.loan_because: I like the idea of helping people start businesses and sustain their families in good health. I prefer private rather than government assistance.
lender.occupational_info: I did research and managed large projects involving air and rail safety. After working 45 years I am now retired, but my education and interest concerns other peoples, cultures and relationships.

lender.name: Valery
lender.loan_because: Giving back to people who are trying to achieve their dreams and goals in life. You can wins!
lender.occupational_info: I work with kids who have low scores in school, my efforts are to help them raised, achieve and go further. Never giving up to learn, failure is not an option.

lender.name: Dr. Patrick Mendis
lender.loan_because: These courageous micro-entrepreneurs remind me that I was like one of them when I was growing up with 13 water-buffaloes on a three-acre rice field in Sri Lanka. I know the value of micro-loan, which helped my family to break-away from the cycle of poverty caused by poor rice harvest, unpredictable monsoon, or simply being poor. A small loan could transform a person, a family, a village, and a nation.
lender.occupational_info: As an AFS (American Field Service) scholar I came to Minnesota in 1978 to study. After my government service in Washington, I returned to academia. Now I am an affiliate professor of public and international affairs at George Mason University. With the sales of my recent books, I established a number of tsunami scholarships and a Peace Prize in Sri Lanka. All proceeds after income tax are donated to charity and micro-finance programs. [Photo: With Jessica Jackley Flannery, the co-founder of Kiva at the U.S. Chamber of Commerce in Washington, DC].

lender.name: Farzana Kashfi
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference, however small...
lender.occupational_info: I work to empower adolescent girls, living in rural Bangladesh

lender.name: The Merringers
lender.loan_because: We want our children to live in the best world possible.
lender.occupational_info: I stay home to raise our two sons, while my husband sells sporting equipment.

lender.name: Linda
lender.loan_because: I was born in the right place and the right time. I've been lucky.

lender.name: Chanah & Nicholas
lender.loan_because: I like to contribute my part in making this world a better place for others.
lender.occupational_info: Project Manager for a major Pharmaceutical Company

lender.name: Andrea
lender.loan_because: I want to change the world little by little

lender.name: Cynthia
lender.occupation: Retired attorney and retired ESL teacher
lender.loan_because: it's a wonderful way to help others provide for themselves and their families.
lender.occupational_info: As a volunteer attorney I help immigrants in the United States with their immigration-related legal problems.

lender.name: Marie
lender.loan_because: I like the idea of an organization like Kiva, that can connect people across oceans and between continents. Living in such an economically blessed country, I feel an obligation to give back however I can, and this provides an amazing opportunity to do so!
lender.occupational_info: I study at a university in the United States, and am planning to get an undergraduate degree in History and Spanish soon!

lender.name: Allen
lender.loan_because: God has blessed me, and I am happy to share that blessing with others. May God, through his son Jesus Christ bless all who look to him for their needs.
lender.occupational_info: I teach 17 and 18 year old students about government, business and money.

lender.name: Roseann
lender.loan_because: A little sharing can make a huge difference.

lender.name: Tonja
lender.loan_because: There are so many people out on the street asking for money. Loaning money for someone to better themselves seems right and good.

lender.name: Patty
lender.loan_because: I want to help people who are helping themselves.

lender.name: Brian
lender.loan_because: I want to give other people the chance to start their own business. I started my own business and understand how hard it is to raise money for tools/supplies.
lender.occupational_info: I record sound for TV shows, commercials and documentaries.

lender.name: San
lender.loan_because: Micro loans make a difference. A little from me make a difference in present and future for individuals and their families.
lender.occupational_info: I help people plan and manage their investment savings so that they can live their desired financial future.

lender.name: Kathleen
lender.loan_because: I believe in this. I want to help other people be empowered. I have had times in my life when I have needed help, and now it's my turn to give back - and I do so very happily!
lender.occupational_info:
I am a change agent. Right now my job is working on changing my thoughts and beliefs about myself and the world I live in to positive ones that bring me peace and joy!
And for everyone requesting loans - I say go for it!! Grab onto your idea and don't let go. You can do it!!

lender.name: motoko
lender.occupational_info: housewife

lender.name: Alexandra
lender.loan_because: God blesses me with the gift of lending.
lender.occupational_info: I help guide students through school to get a college education.

lender.name: Kate
lender.loan_because: We need to create a world that works for everyone.
lender.occupational_info: I try to make things beautiful.

lender.name: Steve
lender.loan_because: Why should I have so much with ease just because of the location of my birth?
lender.occupational_info: I repair refrigeration and air conditioning machinery

lender.name: Jude
lender.loan_because: I believe in making a difference, and the power of microfinance.

lender.name: Chad
lender.loan_because: We want to steward what we have been entrusted with.

lender.name: K & F
lender.loan_because: The Earth is too small not to help each other.
lender.occupational_info: agriculture

lender.name: Dominic Hebert
lender.loan_because: providing capital is an effective form of assistance.

lender.name: Ginette
lender.loan_because: I'm a blessed person and I have lived in many developing countries over the years. I think it's important for all of us who can, to support and give a hand to others. I love to help women to support themselves.

lender.name: Danny
lender.loan_because: I like to give back.
lender.occupational_info: I am an entertainer and musician.

lender.name: Dinah
lender.loan_because: I am in the fortunate position of being able to lend a hand...
lender.occupational_info: Brilliant! I work in a public library.

lender.name: Karl-Anders
lender.loan_because: I believe in every entrepreneur's equal right to have access to the necessary funds to start or maintain a business.
lender.occupational_info: Founder of a company working to make mobile phones easier and more fun to use.

lender.name: Georgie
lender.loan_because: I believe strongly that the world can indeed be changed and improved by one random act of kindness at a time, and I intend to participate as often and in as meaningful a fashion as I humanly can! It's in the Book!
lender.occupational_info: My primary work is as a mother of two small children - one of which is differently-abled. I also work in the legal field part-time when I'm not trying to change the world!

lender.name: Helen
lender.loan_because: I care.

lender.name: Maarten
lender.loan_because: It is a great way to help an individual on the other side of the world! A loan is a great incentive to let the people grow and survive on their own, in stead of making them dependent on outside help.

lender.name: Corporate Jester
lender.loan_because: The world is a small place.
lender.occupational_info: Corporate Jestership is a powerful way of moving organizations towards desired goals, not about entertaining others. Jesters demonstrate the rare ability to illuminate and eliminate blind spots in thinking and action that impact decisions and results, while delivering those insights to the rest of their organizations. Corporate Jester was formed to assist individuals and organizations explore the philosophy and application of jestership as well as learn how to create and support jesters in their own enviroment. Doing so can create dramatic positive impacts on goal attainment, employee engagement, culture and leadership.

lender.name: Martijn
lender.loan_because: Together we can make a difference! One small donation from me can have a huge impact on the life of someone in need!
lender.occupational_info: I work as a software engineer, implementing business solutions for companies to improve their efficiency and productivity.

lender.name: Hana
lender.loan_because: It's important to give, while you have the chance.
lender.occupational_info: Interesting

lender.name: JJ Quint Tim
lender.loan_because: With a little help we make a better world
lender.occupational_info: We are 3 boys. Quint is 4 month, Tim 10 years and JJ is 12 year old. We loan 100$ from grandma Friday. So we have to pay her back.

lender.name: Cari
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: I work in the nonprofit field. I hope to make the world a better place through passion and commitment.

lender.name: Kurt
lender.loan_because: I want to help make up for the misery that the Bush government causes the rest of the world
lender.occupational_info: do what you can while you're here

lender.name: Arthur
lender.loan_because: I think it is a more efficient way to help develop one's business, and I have a part of me that always wanted to do this!
lender.occupational_info: I'm a specialist in web analytics (a website's daily stats): I analyse the collected data and make propositions to the company to make the website evolve in a more efficient way.

lender.name: Pat and Frank
lender.loan_because: it is so much fun to see very small business owners succeed.
lender.occupational_info: We like to find ways to make the world just a litle better.

lender.name: Omar & Lisette
lender.loan_because: I grew up an only child and pretty much had things made. I believe it is now time to give something back.

lender.name: Melissa
lender.loan_because: each of us will be held accountable for how we manage our gifts, and how we treat those who are placed in our path. Kiva widens my path.
lender.occupational_info: manager of an arts and crafts store

lender.name: Jason
lender.loan_because: Working as a Business Development Manager I can appreciate that these people know they need help. Many people today think that they can do it on their own. That may be true. But what I know is true is that together we can do more. As a person born and raised in the "west", I know we have been blessed by geography and economy. My wife teaches many children who have come from places like Sudan. They were born in to places where civil war, poverty, and strife is common place. The least we can do to help our fellow humans is use a service like KIVA and give someone a hand up.
lender.occupational_info: I work with retail flooring stores and our company provides business solutions for them. Such as products, pricing, promotion and financial benefits.

lender.name: Danika
lender.loan_because: it makes me feel good

lender.name: Kelly Kaur
lender.loan_because: When you get... GIVE
lender.occupational_info: I am into brand development and have been in the aviation field for the last 9 years.

lender.name: Ram
lender.loan_because: I want to help those who help themselves.

lender.name: GPC Freshmen
lender.loan_because: We loan as a class--each student donates money and we vote about who we'd like to sponsor.
lender.occupational_info: In my English classes, my goal is that students become engaged in the world and write from that experience. Kiva is a great way to introduce students to someplace outside of Kentucky.

lender.name: Rosita
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserve a chance to live a good life. God created us to lead a good life not be disparity or facing poverty. Global problems are everyone's issue.
lender.occupational_info: Volunteers, spiritual guidance and social worker.

lender.name: JEANNE
lender.loan_because: I can
lender.occupational_info: Working with local small businesses and individuals

lender.name: Anthony
lender.loan_because: I am the son of refugees from Vietnam. An entire community in Parnell, MO embraced my mom, dad and I in 1975 and helped us get on our feet by helping us financially and learning the language and culture. I have been very fortunate to be able to live in such a great country and to have my own business. This is a great way for me and my business to give back and embrace the entrepreneur's spirit worldwide.
lender.occupational_info: I have a handyman/remodeling business. When I'm not working, I enjoy spending time with my family and dogs.

lender.name: Sonin Family
lender.loan_because: Microloans ROCK!
lender.occupational_info:
Juhan is a product designer.... designing things people use everyday.
Kate is a fashion designer.... designing clothes, bags, accessories.

lender.name: Rebecca
lender.loan_because: if I was in the same situation I hope someone would do the same for me.
lender.occupational_info: I run a company that works so that others have a better life.

lender.name: victoria
lender.loan_because: I love the optimism and energy of these people. They deserve a chance.

lender.name: Snuggs
lender.loan_because: People willing to work to help their family and themselves are worth the risk. A community is not counted by the number of outstreached palms in search of a handout. It is measured by the numbers of hands high in the air saying "we've had enough".

lender.name: yolande
lender.occupation: insurance advisor/social assistant for elder peopl

lender.name: Deb P.
lender.loan_because: I love the concept of microcrdeit and the direct impact it can have on lives around the world.

lender.name: Peter Cow
lender.loan_because: It makes sense.
lender.occupational_info: I help people to live more sustainably.

lender.name: Seth
lender.loan_because: because I love and follow Jesus Christ. My life does not consist of the abundance of my possessions. Jesus said, "Whatever you did for one of the least of these you did for me."

lender.name: Ally
lender.loan_because: I can, and I believe in what Kiva is doing

lender.name: Alexis
lender.occupation: Project Manager for Affordable Housing Org

lender.name: Clare
lender.loan_because: I have a little to share with those who are trying to make their lives better.
lender.occupational_info: I taught teenagers the business skills needed to work in business office occupations until my retirement.

lender.name: Charles
lender.loan_because: I feel everyone should be given the chance to live life to the fullest. Why can't I be the catalyst to allow that to happen.
lender.occupational_info: I study about politics and government.

lender.name: vegivamp
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Priya
lender.loan_because: it's what I want to do. My uncle told me about kiva.org, and I thought it was such an amazing idea. It helps people on both ends of the stick and increases awareness of our world that we live in. Here, I feel like I can personally make a difference in someone else's life, even if I live thousands of miles away.
lender.occupational_info: I'm currently a college student!

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: It's a great way to help others

lender.name: Chris Emergui
lender.occupation: Managing partner for BAM Strategy, divine.ca' , we
lender.loan_because: It is so easy to make a difference
lender.occupational_info: Entrepreneur at heart

lender.name: Bob
lender.loan_because: I want to give back.

lender.name: Lynn
lender.loan_because: I am a Christian and we are commanded to love our neighbor. It seems more loving to me to give a loan to help someone than to give a handout. Loans help preserve the dignity of both parties, and a loan to start a business enables the borrower to gain independence.
lender.occupational_info: I teach college students how to use computers and how to build computer networks

lender.name: liliane
lender.loan_because: someone once did the same for me so ! it is obvious
lender.occupational_info: My work is not a work it is a hobby, i like my job soooo much it does not feel like work

lender.name: Sascha
lender.loan_because: Small amounts can make a differents.
lender.occupational_info: Software developer

lender.name: Baggio
lender.loan_because: I can help Kiva to change the world
lender.occupational_info: YBP is founded since 2005 by a crew who love to help people, have fun and be happy. We provide memebers interesting events, build the platform for memeber to trust and assist one another. In addition, we support our members to accomplish their dreams in lives. The ultimate goal is to make members play creatively, live happily and expect to be the best partner for life in the world.

lender.name: Hanne
lender.loan_because: I've been lucky - I would like to share that!
lender.occupational_info: I teach a way to communicate that helps people solve their problems.

lender.name: Sofie
lender.loan_because: I think this is a great way of helping others in need. You actually get to see where your money goes. Because the money gets paid back, you can keep on supporting other people as well. I always wanted to volunteer in a charity organisation, but because I'm ill, that probably isn't going to happen. So this system is a good alternative!
lender.occupational_info: I'm still a student, so I'm not working. I'm studying psychology.

lender.name: Arnoldo
lender.loan_because: There is people that are less fortunate than us.
lender.occupational_info: I answer phones for a living

lender.name: Jesse
lender.loan_because: it helps people help themselves.

lender.name: Victoria
lender.loan_because: It is one of the beautiful compensations of life that no man can sincerely try to help another without helping himself--Ralph Waldo Emerson
lender.occupational_info: I work in a very busy public library that serves a population of about 100,000 people

lender.name: Bart
lender.loan_because: I believe in helping people help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I am an freelance internet consultant.

lender.name: Philip
lender.loan_because: I was lucky enough to be born and raised in a rich country. This lottery of birth should be appreciated.

lender.name: Jack
lender.loan_because: It feels so good to know you're spreading some help around!
lender.occupational_info: I assist families in functioning more closely to the ways in which they want to function.

lender.name: Michelle
lender.loan_because: We are all in this together and it's about love.
lender.occupational_info: I paint my direct experience through conscious awareness of our interconnectedness.

lender.name: Jean Mariani
lender.loan_because: Solo dando al projimo recibiremos bendiciones todos los dias.
lender.occupational_info: Capacitamos a nuestros distribuidores para una vida mejor.

lender.name: Omar
lender.loan_because: This is a great way to empower people to take ownership of their lives.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a high-tech company, so my goal is to make complicated things simple

lender.name: Phoenix
lender.loan_because: everyone deserves a chance for a better life for themselves and their family.

lender.name: Julie & Amir
lender.loan_because: We have - They need - We give...
lender.occupational_info: We help educational institutions manage their construction funds.

lender.name: Fernando
lender.loan_because: I believe in love, partnership, to anyone in need.
lender.occupational_info: Small Business Entrepreneur

lender.name: Evan
lender.loan_because: I have more than these people do and respect the struggle they have. My only hope is this helps them help others. I hope it doesn't enslave them as it has so many of us as we strive for wealth.

lender.name: Kelley
lender.loan_because: "Give a person a fish and they will eat for a day, give a person the means to fish for themselves and that family, community and nation will eat forever"
lender.occupational_info: I help keep computer systems working the way they should.

lender.name: Karin
lender.loan_because: I believe it works.

lender.name: Larry & Arlene
lender.loan_because: God gave us the choice to help others no strings attached and we choose to do that.
lender.occupational_info: This summer we will be on our 26th Mission Trip to help others less fortunate than us.

lender.name: Paula
lender.loan_because: This is a great way to build communities, empower people and feel good at the same time. Kiva helps make the world smaller -- in a good way. Plus, the loan keeps giving!
lender.occupational_info:
I am a community organizer and small business owner. I
My goals are to: Utilize my strengths and skills as an organizer to engage my customers in real and meaningful ways and create a sense of community within Hungry Dog Designs. To foster understanding and appreciation across cultures by putting a human face on the art/culture and providing a venue for customers and artists to build a personal connection.

lender.name: Heleen
lender.loan_because: I would like to help people to start a business, so they can provide for themselves and their family and be a respected person in their community, setting a good example for others.

lender.name: Robert
lender.loan_because: To raise the vibration of the planet. And so little trouble. More deals should be this good.

lender.name: Anil
lender.loan_because: A small good deed done is greater than the grandest Intention
lender.occupational_info: I manage the computing infrastructure at an electric car company

lender.name: Lauren
lender.loan_because:
Everyone goes through hard times, it’s how you pick yourself up that matters most!! No ones life is perfect and I believe we should all help each other out! So surround yourself with family and friends and only good things are in the near future!! :)
"Success usually comes to those who are too busy to be looking for it." Henry David Thoreau
lender.occupational_info: Currently I go to school full time and work part time at a small job, but whenever I'm on break I work at a clothing store called American Eagle!!

lender.name: Sarah
lender.occupation: Director of Recruiting for Consulting Firm
lender.loan_because: I want to help people that have barriers to pursuing their dreams.
lender.occupational_info: I hire and manage people to do business and finance projects for other companies.

lender.name: Alejandro
lender.loan_because: I believe this is one of the greatest ways to diminish poverty and distribute wealth better around the globe.
lender.occupational_info: I started an advertising company.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves opportunity
lender.occupational_info: I design computer programs for doctors

lender.name: Kevin
lender.loan_because: I believe that there is a greater good to be done in life.

lender.name: Petter
lender.loan_because: It is a wonderful way of contributing in my little way. Kiva is a trustworthy organization, and I am proud to be cooperating with them.
lender.occupational_info: I am responsible for development, production and release of a number of television programmes.

lender.name: Laura
lender.loan_because: We're all in this together!

lender.name: susan
lender.loan_because: its great feeling to be part of people working and striving to achieve their own individal aims

lender.name: Misam
lender.loan_because: If you fear focus on courage If there is lack focus on abundance If there is disease focus on health focus on them not as if you will achieve them instead believe that you have them now..love
lender.occupational_info: I love my job I sell Aflac policies and think its a great company with great products !

lender.name: Jhim
lender.loan_because: I want to embark a new business to pay internet services in my comunity
lender.occupational_info:
I work with computers.. in all fields.
i am programer and web programer

lender.name: Clay
lender.loan_because: it is the right thing to do
lender.occupational_info: i work in the lending division. I finance homes

lender.name: Jill Konrath
lender.loan_because: I support entrepreneurs in developing countries who are striving to achieve economic self-sufficiency.
lender.occupational_info: I help entrepreneurs and salespeople grow their businesses.

lender.name: jose
lender.loan_because: I need the loan to hire adword google to promote my web site on ecology, a book and a CD of music typical Caribbean
lender.occupational_info: My work is very nice, but so far I have not been able to promote my projects

lender.name: Katy Hargrove
lender.loan_because: We've all got to help each other out.
lender.occupational_info: I work on Guild Wars and make art.

lender.name: Barbara
lender.loan_because: i have so much in the way of love, health and other wealth in my life, i want to share with others. i hope that my small loans can help put a smile on someone's face and that smile in turn will put a smile on someone else's face.

lender.name: Tim
lender.loan_because: It's great way to share the blessings I've been given with others.

lender.name: Sherry
lender.loan_because: I raised 4 children as a divorcee. I "reinvented" myself several times in an effort to better provide for my family. I have been a Master Plumber and Electrician, went to nursing school in my 40's, and am now becoming a personal fitness trainer with a gym in my home. I resigned my RN position to stay at home and care for my adult profoundly retarded and handicapped son. I have been praying for money to operate my own business. I suddenly felt selfish when I thought of the many others who have never had the chance to better their lives. I hope my small loan will make a difference.
lender.occupational_info: I provide full time care to my 40 year old son who is profoundly retarded and handicapped. I have purchased fitness equipment, am becoming certified as a fitness instructor and will operate a home business that offers personal fitness training. and nutritional consultation. In our country we have a great number of people who do not toil daily and have the need to improve their physical health.

lender.name: Tina
lender.loan_because: I hope I can help someone even if it is in the smallest of ways.
lender.occupational_info: I am a nurse so I help care for people everyday.

lender.name: Steve
lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: Neusa Maria
lender.whereabouts: Caxias do Sul Rio Grande do Sul
lender.occupation: Florista and decoradora of weddings and parties.
lender.loan_because: For me to buy a vehicle to carry flowers, because my car was stolen. I came to you through the program's Oprah.
lender.occupational_info: Then three of my children is what I have more important since it is that the shooting sustenance for the whole family.

lender.name: Eric
lender.loan_because: It is selfish not to. I studied Anthropology in college, which gave me a love for cultures and people from around the globe.
lender.occupational_info: Manage apartment complexes in the Kentucky region.
